headline: Cloud-Native Application Monitoring Platforms Company Benchmark Report 2025 | Chronosphere, Datadog, Dynatrace, Elastic, Grafana Labs, Honeycomb, ManageEngine, New Relic, SolarWinds
summary: The market offers opportunities in enhancing visibility and observability for cloud-native applications due to challenges in monitoring dynamic environments like Kubernetes. Growth is driven by the need for comprehensive observability platforms that integrate cloud-native monitoring to optimize application performance, reliability, and security.Dublin, Sept. 02, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- The "Cloud-Native Application Monitoring Platforms, 2025: A Frost Radar Report" report has been added to Resea
